issues.title: [TEZ-3497] Upgrade Jetty to 9.3.X
issues.body:
[Upgrade Jetty to 9.3.X](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/TEZ-3497)

Jetty 6.X have not keep in maintain and should upgrade to the current version.

issues.title: TEZ-3475 Merge duplicated method into base class
issues.body:
Merge duplicated method (handleEvents and close) into MRTask.class

[Merge duplicated method into base class](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/TEZ-3475)

issues.title: [TEZ-3369][WIP] Fixing Tez's DAGClients to work with Cascading
issues.body:
Adding a few APIs to Tez to help Cascading break its dependency on an internal implementation and still get some of the data it needs. 
Added APIs:

```
DAGInformation getDAGInformation()
TaskInformation getTaskInformation(String vertexID, String taskID)
List<TaskInformation> getTaskInformation(String vertexID, @Nullable String startTaskID, int limit)
```

Putting this PR out as a WIP to get some feedback on the APIs and the data they return. 
I'm still working through cleaning up the code, fixing some todos and testing more.

issues.title: [TEZ-3369][WIP] Fixing Tez's DAGClients to work with Cascading
issues.body: Putting a proof of concept PR for one of the approaches listed in the jira: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/TEZ-3369

issues.title: squid:S1213 - The members of an interface declaration or class should appear in a pre-defined order
issues.body:
This pull request is focused on resolving occurrence of Sonar rule
squid:S1213 - The members of an interface declaration or class should appear in a pre-defined order.
This pull request removes 165 minutes of technical debt.
You can find more information about the issue here:
https://dev.eclipse.org/sonar/rules/show/squid:S1213
Please let me know if you have any questions.
George Kankava

commit.message:
TEZ-3880: Do not count rejected tasks as killed in vertex progress (Sergey Shelukhin, reviewed by Gunther Hagleitner)

Signed-off-by: Gopal V <gopalv@apache.org>
TEZ-3877. Delete unordered spill files once merge is done (Jason Lowe via jeagles)
TEZ-3883. Update version in master to 0.9.2 (zhiyuany)
TEZ-3882. Changes for 0.9.1 release (zhiyuany)
TEZ-3876. Bug in local mode distributed cache files (Jacob Tolar via jeagles)
TEZ-3869. Analyzer: Fix VertexInfo::getLastTaskToFinish comparison (rbalamohan)
TEZ-3868. Update website to factor in the TEZ trademark registration.
TEZ-3867. testSendCustomProcessorEvent try to get array out of read only ByteBuffer (Zhiyuan Yang via kshukla)
TEZ-3855 addendum. Allow vertex manager to send event to processor (zhiyuany)
TEZ-3855. Allow vertex manager to send event to processor (zhiyuany)
TEZ-3861. PipelineSorter setting negative progess (rbalamohan)
TEZ-3857. Tez TaskImpl can throw Invalid state transition for leaf tasks that do Retro Active Transition (kshukla)
TEZ-3862. Tez UI: Upgrade em-tgraph to version 0.0.14 (Jonathan Eagles via kshukla)
TEZ-3858. Misleading dag level diagnostics in case of invalid vertex event (Zhiyuan Yang via kshukla)
TEZ-3666. Integer overflow in ShuffleVertexManagerBase (Ming Ma via zhiyuany)
TEZ-3856. API to access counters in InputInitializerContext (Prasanth Jayachandran via zhiyuany)
TEZ-3849. Combiner+PipelinedSorter silently drops records (Jacob Tolar via kshukla)
TEZ-3853. Binary incompatibility caused by DEFAULT_LOG_LEVEL (zhiyuany)
TEZ-3854. Make use of new improved em-table sort-icon (Jonathan Eagles via kshukla)
TEZ-3850. Enable header as sort button on Tez UI (Jonathan Eagles)
TEZ-3852. Optimize ContainerContext.isSuperSet to speed container reuse decisions. Contributed by Jonathan Eagles
TEZ-3844. Tez UI Dag Counters show no records for a RUNNING DAG. (jeagles)
TEZ-3848. Tez Local mode doesn't localize distributed cache files (Jacob Tolar via jeagles)
TEZ-3847. AM web controller task counters are empty sometimes. Contributed by Jonathan Eagles
TEZ-3830. HistoryEventTimelineConversion should not hard code the Task state. (Kuhu Shukla via jeagles)
TEZ-3833. Tasks should report codec errors during shuffle as fetch failures. Contributed by Kuhu Shukla
TEZ-3845. Tez UI Cleanup Stats Table (Jonathan Eagles via kshukla)
TEZ-3843. Tez UI Vertex/Tasks log links for running tasks are missing (jeagles)
TEZ-3836. Tez UI task page sort does not work on RHEL7/Fedora. Contributed by Sreenath Somarajapuram
TEZ-3840 addendum. Tez should write TEZ_DAG_ID before TEZ_EXTRA_INFO (Jonathan Eagles via kshukla)

issue_comments.body: Closing this out and using std patch on apache jira instead.

Hi @ljl1988com the four commits you are trying to request a merge for should already be in both master and branch 0.6. They will have different commit-ids as they were cherry-picked into the 0.6 branch.
Closings as this is now merged.

Thanks @dharmeshkakadia. Can you file an apache jira at https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/tez and attach the patch to the jira too ( we currently do not have the pre-commit tests running against git pull requests )
@dharmeshkakadia  Mind closing this pull request given that this is merged? Thanks.
This is merged as part of Tez-3453.

commit_comments.body:
Hi @sidseth 
We are a team of researchers from Iowa State, The University of Texs at Dallas and Oregon State University, USA. We are investigating common/repeated code changes.
We have four short questions regarding the change in the image below which is part of this commit.
![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/2257582/23105972/689c3ca6-f6ac-11e6-9fbc-25a99afa493d.png)

Questions:

Q1- Is the change at these lines similar to any other changes (from other locations of the same commit or from other commits)? (yes, no, not sure)

Q2- Can you briefly describe the change and why you made it? (for example, checking parameter before calling the method to avoid a Null Pointer Exception)

Q3- Can you give it a name? (for example, Null Check)

Q4- Would you like to have this change automated by a tool? (Yes, No, Already automated)

The data collected from the answers will never be associated with you or your project. Our questions are about recurring code changes from the developer community, not about personal information. All the data is merged across recurring changes from GitHub repositories. We will publish aggregated data from the trends of the whole community. 
We have a long tradition of developing refactoring tools and contributing them freely to the Eclipse, Netbeans, Android Studio under their respective FLOSS licenses. For example, look at some of our recently released refactoring tools: http://refactoring.info/tools/ 

Thank you,
Hoan Nguyen https://sites.google.com/site/nguyenanhhoan/
Michael Hilton http://web.engr.oregonstate.edu/~hiltonm/
Tien Nguyen http://www.utdallas.edu/~tien.n.nguyen/
Danny Dig http://eecs.oregonstate.edu/people/dig-danny
